channel.title: CVE Feed for Unitree Robotics -- A1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unitree Robotics -- A1

item.title: CVE-2023-3104|2024-08-02T06:48:07.001Z -- unitree%20robotics -- a1
item.description: Lack of authentication vulnerability. An unauthenticated local user is able to see through the cameras using the web server due to the lack of any form of authentication.

item.title: CVE-2023-3103|2024-08-02T06:48:07.090Z -- unitree%20robotics -- a1
item.description: Authentication bypass vulnerability, the exploitation of which could allow a local attacker to perform a Man-in-the-Middle (MITM) attack on the robot's camera video stream. In addition, if a MITM attack is carried out, it is possible to consume the robot's resources, which could lead to a denial-of-service (DOS) condition.
